content.raw: The preceding code comment does not make it clear to me what this line should do. In any case, I don’t observe different behaviour with this change, i.e. in both cases I see new columns added to the table \(e.g. when a shot is added with a newly created global\), and this global is checked as visible in the ‘Edit visible columns’ dialog.
